data.name: Wizard time!
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1231840


About the Game

It's ”Wizard time!” – hardcore platformer with puzzle elements. Use different spell books and your skills to complete levels!

Play as a ise Wizard who is searching for ancient spells. His way is full of dangerous traps and evil dragons – collect spell books to learn new magic and pass hardcore puzzle levels! Find what he is looking for!

Game Features:
  • Use unique spell magic and your brains
  • Pass 30 handmade puzzle levels
  • And find all secrets!

Only wise and clever player can complete the game. Accept the challenge!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
